name: Pong (itch) (Pop0p)
description:
Pong

I had some free time, so i made a pong prototype. This game is not completed, i may update it occasionally because it lacks finishes.

You can play it with keyboard or controllers (tested with xbox one controllers).

Player 1Player 2UPZUp arrowDOWNSDown arrow

You can also play against the IA.

List of resources used and which I remember  : 

  • https://www.kenney.nl/assets/ui-pack
  • https://audiojungle.net/item/hit-game-item-07/19276571
  • https://audiojungle.net/item/deep-impact/9571638
  • https://audiojungle.net/item/countdown-3-2-1-go-v2/23647255
  • https://audiojungle.net/item/strong-hit-explosion/234656
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/fullscreen-camera-effects/mk-g...
  • https://noobtuts.com/unity/2d-pong-game

Cheers !
